mapper.select: select count(*) from `like` l inner join `post` p on l.post_seq = p.seq where p.code in ('모집') and l.user_seq = #{userSeq}

WITH filtered_like_post AS (SELECT l.user_seq, l.post_seq, l.created_at FROM `like` l INNER JOIN `post` p ON l.post_seq = p.seq WHERE p.code IN ('모집') AND l.user_seq = #{userSeq})
SELECT like_post_info.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM `like` WHERE post_seq = like_post_info.post_seq) AS likeCount FROM (SELECT flp.user_seq, flp.post_seq, flp.created_at, nsbi.store_name FROM post p INNER JOIN filtered_like_post flp ON p.seq = flp.post_seq INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_seq = u.seq INNER JOIN national_store_business_information nsbi ON u.business_number = nsbi.business_number) AS like_post_info ORDER BY like_post_info.created_at desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from (select to_user_seq from zzim z where from_user_seq = #{userSeq}) zzimed_user inner join user u on zzimed_user.to_user_seq = u.seq where u.code = 'STORE'

WITH filtered_zzimed_user AS (SELECT z.to_user_seq, z.created_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY z.created_at DESC) AS row_num FROM zzim z INNER JOIN user u ON u.seq = z.to_user_seq WHERE z.from_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND u.code = 'STORE') SELECT u.seq, nsbi.store_name, u.store_location, fzu.created_at, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ft.dish ORDER BY ft.dish ASC) AS foodTypes FROM filtered_zzimed_user fzu INNER JOIN user u ON u.seq = fzu.to_user_seq INNER JOIN national_store_business_information nsbi ON u.business_number = nsbi.business_number LEFT JOIN user_food_type uft ON u.seq = uft.user_seq LEFT JOIN food_type ft ON uft.food_type_seq = ft.seq WHERE fzu.row_num > #{offset} AND fzu.row_num <= #{offset} + #{pageSize} GROUP BY u.seq, u.business_number, nsbi.store_name, u.store_location, fzu.created_at ORDER BY fzu.created_at DESC;
select count(*) from (select to_user_seq from zzim z where from_user_seq = #{userSeq}) zzimed_user inner join user u on zzimed_user.to_user_seq = u.seq where u.code = 'CUSTOMER'

WITH filtered_zzimed_user AS (SELECT z.to_user_seq, z.created_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY z.created_at DESC) AS row_num FROM zzim z INNER JOIN user u ON u.seq = z.to_user_seq WHERE z.from_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND u.code = 'CUSTOMER') SELECT u.seq, u.nickname, fzu.created_at, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ft.dish ORDER BY ft.dish ASC) AS foodTypes FROM filtered_zzimed_user fzu INNER JOIN user u ON u.seq = fzu.to_user_seq LEFT JOIN user_food_type uft ON u.seq = uft.user_seq LEFT JOIN food_type ft ON uft.food_type_seq = ft.seq WHERE fzu.row_num > #{offset} AND fzu.row_num <= #{offset} + #{pageSize} GROUP BY u.seq, u.nickname, fzu.created_at ORDER BY fzu.created_at DESC;
